title: ANC’s NGC resolutions will close down the democratic space (DA - Democratic Alliance)
text: ( Source : DA - Democratic Alliance ) The problematic resolutions adopted by the ANC at its National General Council ( NGC ) this weekend are indicative of a party in rapid decline and desperately trying to hold onto power by eroding South
